meanings.definition: A custom in some cultures where the father-to-be exhibits symptoms of pregnancy or undergoes rituals associated with childbirth.
meanings.sent1: During the couvade, the father-to-be experiences similar symptoms as the expectant mother.
meanings.sent2: The couvade tradition involves the father-to-be taking on pregnancy-like symptoms.
meanings.sent3: At the couvade ceremony, the father-to-be wore a fake baby bump for fun.
meanings.sent4: The couvade practice symbolizes the father's supportive role during pregnancy.
meanings.sent5: The couvade ritual makes the father-to-be feel more connected to the upcoming birth.

meanings.definition: The act of participating in or experiencing symptoms of pregnancy as a father-to-be.
meanings.sent1: His couvade experience included cravings and mood swings.
meanings.sent2: Experiencing couvade symptoms can help fathers empathize with pregnant partners.
meanings.sent3: The couvade phenomenon can be both amusing and enlightening for fathers-to-be.
meanings.sent4: The couvade process allows fathers to share in the physical aspects of pregnancy.
meanings.sent5: Going through couvade symptoms can be a unique bonding experience for couples.
